quotes.body: Whether you go up the ladder or down the ladder, your position is shaky
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.body: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H Jackson Brown, Jr

quotes.body: Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells (1866-1946)

quotes.body: The whole problem with the world is that fools and fanatics are always so certain of themselves, and wiser people so full of doubts.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell (1872-1970)

quotes.body: Don't be so humble - you are not that great.
quotes.author: Golda Meir (1898-1978) to a visiting diploma

quotes.body: Not everything that can be counted counts, and not everything that counts can be counted.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein (1879-1955)

quotes.body: I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei (1564-1642)

quotes.body: Give me a museum and I'll fill it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso (1881-1973)

quotes.body: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson (1743-1826)
